DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the investigator new modification for delorme procedure in patients with rectal prolapse , assessing intra-operative morbidity and recurrence rate .
DOC.brief_title: A Modified Technique to Facilitate Pealing of the Rectal Mucosa in Delorme Operation
DOC.detailed_description: In classic delorme operation stripping of the mucosa done and this is associated with extensive bleeding in addition to the time consumed in this step.the new modification done by the investigator replace this step with another associated with less intraoperative bleeding and not time consuming.
DOC.criteria: Mild to moderate rectal prolapse Singed informed consent. Huge rectal prolapse . Recurrent rectal prolapse
